alert.note: Alert for Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:05PM CST until December 16 at 6:01AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN EAST CARROLL AND NORTH CENTRAL MADISON PARISHES... NORTHWESTERN WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES... At 1105 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Omega, or near Tallulah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Eagle Bend around 1115 PM CST. Valley Park around 1130 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
